cn.edu.uestc.acmicpc.db.condition.base

Class Condition

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.edu.uestc.acmicpc.db.condition.base.Condition
  • Deprecated. 
    this class is deprecated, use BaseCriteria instead.

    @Deprecated
public class Condition
extends java.lang.Object
    Conditions setting for Dao.findAll(String, Condition) and Dao.count(Condition).

    For Developers:

    If this condition is stored as Condition.Entry.getValue(), we ignore the order of it.
